WEAPON.Title: Heavy Weapon Set
WEAPON.Requirement: Purchase a newspaper after completing the “Advertising, the New American Art” Chapter 3

WEAPON.Title: Simple Weapon Set
WEAPON.Code: A simple life, a beautiful death

WEAPON.Title: Infinite Ammo
WEAPON.Effect: Unlocks Infinite Ammo for All Guns
WEAPON.Requirement: Newspaper located and purchased in Valentine, Chapter 1

POWER UP.Title: Full Health, Stamina, and Dead Eye
POWER UP.Effect: Completely Restores all bars for Health, Stamina, and Dead Eye

POWER UP.Title: Fully Restore and Fortify Health, Stamina, and Dead Eye
POWER UP.Effect: Completely Restores and Fortify all bars for Health, Stamina, and Dead Eye
POWER UP.Code: You Seek More Than The World Offers
POWER UP.Requirement: Purchase a newspaper after completing the “The King’s Son” Chapter 6.

POWER UP.Title: Increase Health, Stamina, and Dead Eye Stats
POWER UP.Effect: Increases Health, Stamina, and Dead Eye Statistics
POWER UP.Code: Seek all the bounty of this place

POWER UP.Title: Infinite Stamina
POWER UP.Requirement: Purchase a newspaper after completing Chapter 5.

POWER UP.Title: Raise Honor
POWER UP.Requirement: Purchase a newspaper after completing the “Urban Pleasures” Chapter 4.

POWER UP.Title: Decrease Honor
POWER UP.Code: You revel in your disgrace, I see
POWER UP.Requirement: Purchase a newspaper after completing the “Urban Pleasures” Chapter 4.

POWER UP.Title: Reset Honor
POWER UP.Effect: When Activated reduces Honor to Neutral

POWER UP.Title: Increase Horse Whistle Range
POWER UP.Effect: Allows you to Call your horse from any distance in the game

POWER UP.Title: Increase Horse Bonding
POWER UP.Effect: Raises your horse bonding with all your owned horses

WORLD.Title: Increase Wanted Level
WORLD.Effect: Increase Wanted Level in the game

WORLD.Title: Decrease Wanted Level
WORLD.Effect: Decrease Wanted Level in the game

WORLD.Title: Clear Bounties and Lockdowns
WORLD.Effect: Clear all bounties and lockdown areas
WORLD.Code: You want everyone to go away

WORLD.Title: Fog of War
WORLD.Effect: Reveals Entire Map In Game, no more Fog of War.
WORLD.Code: You Long for Sight but See Nothing
WORLD.Requirement: Purchase a newspaper after completing the “Blood Feuds, Ancient and Modern” Chapter 3.

SPAWN.Title: War Horse
SPAWN.Code: You are a beast built for war
SPAWN.Requirement: Purchase a newspaper after the events of the Epilogue.

SPAWN.Title: Superior Horse
SPAWN.Code: You want more than you have

SPAWN.Title: Stagecoach
SPAWN.Code: The best of the old ways

SPAWN.Title: Circus Wagon
SPAWN.Code: Would you be happier as a clown?
SPAWN.Requirement: Purchase a newspaper after the events of the Epilogue.

UNLOCK.Title: Unlock All Camp Upgrades
UNLOCK.Effect: Instantly obtain ledger upgrades and supply levels are maxed out

UNLOCK.Title: Unlock All Crafting Recipes
UNLOCK.Effect: You will learn all the crafting recipes, however, they will still cost ingredients to make
